perturbation.original_text: Licensee shall have the non-exclusive right and license to develop and distribute ICE AGE 2 Wireless Products during the Term of the Agreement for all Wireless Products set forth in this Paragraph 2(c) except the Game, for which Licensee shall have the exclusive right and license to develop and distribute until December 31, 2006. For the avoidance of doubt, Licensee’s right and license to develop and distribute the Game in connection with the Property “ICE AGE 2” shall become non-exclusive after December 31, 2006.
perturbation.changed_text: Licensee shall have the non-exclusive right and license to develop and distribute ICE AGE 2 Wireless Products during the Term of the Agreement for all Wireless Products set forth in this Paragraph 2(c) except the Game, for which Licensee shall have the exclusive right and license to develop and distribute indefinitely. For the avoidance of doubt, Licensee’s right and license to develop and distribute the Game in connection with the Property “ICE AGE 2” shall remain exclusive perpetually.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a contradiction regarding the exclusivity of the 'ICE AGE 2' game license. The original text states the license becomes non-exclusive after December 31, 2006, but the modified text asserts the license remains exclusive indefinitely.

perturbation.original_text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, in no event will Fox develop, publish and/or distribute games derived from the Property “ICE AGE 2” prior to January 1, 2007.
perturbation.changed_text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, Fox reserves the right to develop, publish and/or distribute games derived from the Property “ICE AGE 2” at any time.
perturbation.explanation: The original text restricts Fox from developing 'ICE AGE 2' games before January 1, 2007. The modified text removes this restriction, granting Fox the right to develop and distribute these games at any time, even before the previously specified date, creating a contradiction.

perturbation.original_text: Licensee’s term of exclusivity with respect to the KOH Video Clips shall expire on October 29, 2005, and Licensee’s right and license to distribute the KOH Video Clips shall expire twelve (12) months after the initial theatrical release of the Property “KINGDOM OF HEAVEN”.
perturbation.changed_text: Licensee’s term of exclusivity with respect to the KOH Video Clips shall not expire. Licensee’s right and license to distribute the KOH Video Clips shall continue in perpetuity.
perturbation.explanation: The original text sets a clear expiration date for Licensee’s exclusive distribution rights of KOH Video Clips. The modified text removes any expiration, granting indefinite exclusive distribution rights, creating a contradiction regarding the term of exclusivity.
